rules_text: At the beginning of each player’s upkeep, that player discards a card or sacrifices a nontoken, nonland permanent. If Tithe to the Machine was sacrificed this way, create a 2/2 black Zombie artifact creature token for each card type among cards integrated onto it. Otherwise, integrate that card. [i](To integrate a card, exile it, then you may choose a nonland permanent it’s integrated onto.)[/i]
notes:
!canoncard Torment of Scarabs
 101: Integrating is now optional.
